remarks: Multiplicativity of the determinant function: the determinant of a matrix product of square matrices equals the product of their determinants.  Proposition 4.15 in [Lang] p. 517.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mdetmul.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdetmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdetmul.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetmul.t1 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mdetmul.t2 $e |- .xb = ( .r ` A ) $.
mdetmul $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( D ` ( F .xb G ) ) = ( ( D ` F ) .x. ( D ` G ) ) ) $.
